name: The 4th World Conference on Social Sciences
content: Have you signed up to join the 4th World Conference on Social Sciences on the 10-12 of June 2022 in Oxford, UK? If you havenâ€™t yet, then you should. As a member of academia, scholar, scientist, or researcher, staying on top of the trends is essential for your continued career development. social science conferences 2022 is an opportunity to learn from the international community of academics and address the latest developments in the field in an engaging, dynamic environment. international conference on social sciences offers publishing opportunities with premier indexed journals, a free tour of the spectacular city of Oxford, countless learning and networking sessions, and a warm, welcoming environment for all attendees.
